DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Swallowing Sword Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A gleaming 19" metal blade appears to slide right down your throat, COMPLETELY DOWN to the metal handle. Use this trick sword to imitate real skill, or as a gag. Looks great from all angles and is VERY CONVINCING even from a few feet away. Specially made thin metal blade collapses (rolls) back on itself, which allows you to imitate the feats of a genuine sword swallower. Individually boxed, wooden handle, metal blade, complete with instructions. Recommended for grown-up audiences only.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes individually boxed wooden handle, special trick metal 19" blade, and instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Baby Tail Spin Magic Tricks
DescriptionData.Description: This hilarious prop is guaranteed to make kids snort and bray! They won't be able to keep their laughter "burro"-ed! You show a picture of the cutest little ol' donkey you ever saw. But the poor fellow is missing his tail. Slide the donkey picture into an envelope with a large window. A child pretends to throw the tail, and when you pull out the donkey, the tail is stuck to his nose. His eyes are crossed and his ears bent back in surprise! Kids howl! It's not the helper's fault -- you know how stubborn donkeys are! Put it back in, try again, and this time when you pull it out, the tail is completely gone. You look all around for it, and suddenly the kids scream their lungs out because the tail is hanging out of the back of your pants! Trust me on this, the children will weep with joy! This bit of tomfoolery can be used in a variety of settings. Based on an idea by Edwin Hooper with a twist by Selina Frederick. Using Selina's wonderful artwork, TAIL SPIN is printed in full color on heavy boards with a high-gloss finish. You're bound to get a KICK out of this one!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Based on an idea by Edwin Hooper with a twist by Selina Frederick
Printed in full color on heavy boards with a high-gloss finish

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Thread Reel Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: The Thread Reel gives you a usable length of invisible thread to use in a convenient and compact way. As the name implies, the "invisible thread" cannot be seen under the right performing conditions, making it somewhat difficult for the performer to see and handle it. The Thread Reel is designed to allow you easy access to the thread whenever you need it! Invisible thread is perfect for use in levitation and animation effects, the most famous of which is "Fred Kap's Floating and Dancing Cork," where a cork floats in midair right under a spectator's nose! Includes information on attaching objects to the thread, lighting conditions, and several ideas for use as well as tips on handling the Thread Reel.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mini thread reel magic trick kit
Includes information on attaching objects to the thread, lighting conditions, several ideas for use, and tips for handling the third reel

DescriptionData.Title: Vernet King Fake Thumb tips
DescriptionData.Description: Vernet Thumbtip, 7/8" diameter, 2 3/8" deep
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Vernet king sized fake thumb tip

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Paradise Brushes - Medium Round
DescriptionData.Description: Paradise Makeup AQ Medium Round Face Painting Brush #814 serves extremely well as a medium brush. Designed by the world-famous face painter, Jinny, Paradise Makeup AQ brushes have luxurious nylon bristles, durable aluminum ferrules, and custom-length acrylic handles designed specifically for face painting. Paradise brushes are excellent professional-grade face and body paint brushes. These Paradise Medium Round brushes are perfect for outlining your face painting designs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Nylon bristles, aluminum ferrules, and acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Nesting Wands - Glitter
DescriptionData.Description: Five high quality wands nest inside one another and seem to keep appearing as you try to hand the wand to an assistant. Colored and glitter wands are 5 different solid colors, and all wands have glitter tips.

DescriptionData.Title: Vernet Flexible Fake Thumb tips
DescriptionData.Description: Vernet Thumbtip, 1" diameter, 2" deep

DescriptionData.Title: Bewildering Traffic Light Beads Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You show your audience three extra large safety pins with colored beads. One pin is chosen and placed into your hand behind your back. Without looking, you predict which color is chosen every time! Easy to do. Safety Routine and other routine ideas included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Traffic light beads magic trick kit
Safety routine and other routine ideas included

DescriptionData.Title: Vanishing Cane Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You twirl a cane between your fingers and even tap it on the floor to prove it's solid. While you hold the cane on each end, it instantaneously changes into two large silks (not included) or vanishes altogether! You will also need two (18 inch silks) or 24 inch silks to perform this effect.

DescriptionData.Title: Tootsie Pops
DescriptionData.Description: One at a time, four Tootsie Roll pops are pulled from a bag, showing four different flavors. Pick two flavors for yourself to keep and hand the bag with the remaining two to a spectator. But then? They have disappeared! Magically they are in the other bag along with your pops! Now all four are handed out for audience to enjoy! Such a massive upgrade from the old flat plastic lollipop trick! An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a bag and four Tootsie Roll pops

DescriptionData.Title: Deluxe Vanishing Crayons Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: A box of crayons is displayed to the audience. Quick as a wink, the crayons vanish from the box without a trace! Great when used in conjunction with the magic coloring book and other magic coloring effects. Beautifully printed 4.5"x3.25"x0.75" box with instructions.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Deluxe vanishing crayons magic trick kit
Works great with the magic coloring book trick

DescriptionData.Title: Bend-It Wands
DescriptionData.Description: A delightful comedy prop, the Bend-It wand does just what you'd expect it to: it bends into and squiggly, wiggly form you want it to. Made of a soft, durable material and capped with soft white plastic tips, the Bend-It wand has been made to last. When fully extended, the Bend-It Wand is approximately 18 inches long. Supplied complete with detailed, illustrated instuctions and a complete routine.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes detailed, illustrated instructions and a complete routine

DescriptionData.Title: Break Away Wands
DescriptionData.Description: High quality plastic wand appears to be a traditional black wand with white ends, until you hand it to your helper and it "BREAKS" into pieces. Easy to use.

DescriptionData.Title: Color Sense Wands
DescriptionData.Description: Show your audience three different colored magic wands: Red, Blue and Green. Then have a volunteer hide two of the wands in a pocket and place one of the wands in your hand behind your back! You can instantly tell the color of the wand - even if it's still behind your back. Repeat as often as you like - you can even hand the wands out to be examined. Wands are molded in high impact plastic, approximately 4" long, and 0.3" diameter.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Wand magic for crowd pleaser routines
High impact plastic wands - 4" long x 0.3" diameter

DescriptionData.Title: Expanding Wands
DescriptionData.Description: A black and silver magic wand appears as if from nowhere! Expands from an easily concealed 1 inch size up to 20 inches on command or when tossed into the air.

DescriptionData.Title: Nesting Wands - Colored
DescriptionData.Description: Five high quality wands nest inside one another and seem to keep appearing as you try to hand the wand to an assistant. Colored and glitter wands are 5 different solid colors, and all wands have glitter tips.

DescriptionData.Title: Black Nesting Wands
DescriptionData.Description: Five high quality wands nest inside one another and seem to keep appearing as you try to hand the wand to an assistant. This wand has glitter tips.

DescriptionData.Title: Magician's Pen Wands
DescriptionData.Description: This versatile, multi-functional item can be used as a magic wand and as a normal pen! It includes a unique pull-out "curtain," which you can use to promote yourself (produce the curtain with your contact info, then give away the pen or hand out a business card). You can also display a comical message or the punchline to your favorite joke, use it with a force card trick to display your prediction.

DescriptionData.Title: Small Plastic Wands
DescriptionData.Description: Standard black plastic wands, 10 1/2 inches long.

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Plastic Wands (1 Dozen)
DescriptionData.Description: Standard black plastic wands, 7 inches long, 12/pack

DescriptionData.Title: Sparkle Slap Wands (Asst Colors)
DescriptionData.Description: These handy flat wands wrap around your wrist (or hand, or ankle or microphone, or baseball bat or whatever!) when you "slap" one against it. Done quickly the audience thinks you have caused the wand to disappear. They are great fun to play with as well!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Wrap around surfaces when slapped against things

DescriptionData.Title: Comedy Wiggle Wands (16")
DescriptionData.Description: Makes the perfect addition to your magic wand collection. Spring wand can appear to be rigid in your hand, or wiggle and waggle all over the place with a mind of its own! Visual comedy at its best. Great for any show! 16 inches long.

DescriptionData.Title: Wand with 3 Ends
DescriptionData.Description: This Magic Wand with three ends is a great way to end your routine or show.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great way of concluding your show
An innovative prop for your next show

DescriptionData.Title: Wonder Box Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This little "classic" utility prop never fails to mystify. A polished 3" x 2" x 2" chrome box is shown inside and out by opening the sides and top. The audience can clearly see that the box is empty, but after the doors are closed and the magic words are said, the top is opened and silks, ribbons, sponge production items, etc. are produced. You can even take the box apart, put it back together and then produce items from within!

DescriptionData.Title: Juggling Scarves
DescriptionData.Description: Brightly colored Floateez Juggling Scarves from Higgins Brothers are excellent for learning to juggle, teaching large groups of people to juggle or for developing hand-eye coordination. With a simple grabbing motion you can become a juggler, too! Sold in sets of 3 with instructional sheet.

DescriptionData.Title: Fire Sticks from Dube
DescriptionData.Description: The Dubé Klassic Juggling Torches are great for juggling as well as swinging. One piece, solid maple handle has an integral round wood knob with a flat end for balancing and is finished in high gloss white. Wire-reinforced, Kevlar wick is screw-mounted securely to precision fitted aluminum tubing. Each tube is manufactured in one integral piece with a closed end for maximum protection against fuel and fire. Overall length is 20.25 inches, weight is 1.5 inches and average weight is 9 ounces per club. Must be 18 years of age or older to order. Sold in sets of 3.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One-piece solid maple handle finished in high-gloss white
Overall length: 20.25", Weight length 1.5", 9 oz per club
Must be 18 years or older to order

DescriptionData.Title: Higgins Deluxe Flex Handle Torches, 3/set
DescriptionData.Description: Higgins Deluxe Flex Handle Torches are a durable, easy to use accessory for performers.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: White flexible handle and a ring that absorbs shock

DescriptionData.Title: Higgins Bros Spirit Club Sets
DescriptionData.Description:
Higgins Brothers Clubs are sold in packaged sets of 3, assorted colors, with instruction pamphlet. One-piece Spirit Clubs with a white body and colorful, taped handle. The HB Spirit club is an extremely durable unibody juggling club, molded from high impact materials. Spirit Clubs weigh 195g each and are 19.5 inches in length. Colors may vary!
Remember, when performing, there are no mistakes while juggling; just make it part of your act. Here are some helpful lines when you drop a ball or club: - "Gravity Check" - "This is where my act starts picking up!" - "Must be a defective ball" - "Wow! Did you feel that gust of wind?" - "Oops! Back to the drawing board." - Throw the other two down and say, "We'll try it again when you guys can get it right!"

DescriptionData.Title: Higgins Bros Juggling Rings
DescriptionData.Description: Set of three 12.75" juggling rings, Red, Blue and Yellow. By Higgins Brothers.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Sold in sets of three (red, blue and yellow)

DescriptionData.Title: Higgins Brothers Spinning Plates
DescriptionData.Description: These 8 inch blue plates are fabricated from brightly colored, forgiving plastic. First get the plate spinning on the included stick, then practice passing to a partner! Made by Higgins Brothers. Each plate sold individually with stick.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each plate sold individually with stick included

DescriptionData.Title: Higgins Brothers Spinning Plates - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: These 8 inch yellow spinning plates are fabricated from brightly colored, forgiving plastic. First get the plate spinning on the included stick, then practice passing to a partner! Made by Higgins Brothers. Each plate sold individually with stick.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each plate sold individually with stick included

DescriptionData.Title: Devil Sticks
DescriptionData.Description: Juggling devil sticks are easy because of the slow performance speed. Made from Canadian Maple, these Higgins Brothers devil sticks are very durable. Each devil stick is decorated with glitter foil on the middle and both ends. Comes with black rubber handsticks and complete instruction booklet. Approx. 29 inches long.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes black rubber handsticks and complete instruction booklet

DescriptionData.Title: Circus in a Suitcase
DescriptionData.Description: This great all in one set from Higgins Brothers includes 3 juggling balls, 1 diabolo with handsticks and string, 1 spinning plate and their world famous Juggling 101 DVD, all packaged in a nifty traveling circus suitcase
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each kit contains 1 Tropic diabolo with Jive sticks and string, 3 beginner juggling balls, 1 spinning plate with stick, and our world famous Juggling101 DVD
This Circus in a Suitcase has everything you need for jugging and entertaining
The suitcase is handy and light

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Foam Makeup Sponges (1/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Cream Makeup Sponge is a red round dense foam sponge ideal for applying creme or grease makeup. These Makeup Sponge Applicators can be easily cut into wedges and have a stipple texture that can create a realistic orange-peel effect when used on FX Wax or Liquid Latex. Each Graftobian Makeup Sponge is 3 inches in diameter and 3/8 inches thick. Sold individually.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Graftobian cream makeup red foam rubber round sponge
Can be easily cut into wedges

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Powder Puffs - 2" Satin Top
DescriptionData.Description: These little powder puffs are the 2 inch compact size variety. Satin on one side, velour on the other and fairly flat. Sometimes come in pink and other times they come in white. 2/pk
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Satin on one side, velour on the other

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Disposable Dual-Tipped Applicators (1/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Small Dual Tipped Applicators are disposable foam face paint applicators. Each Snazaroo dual-tipped applicator has 1/2 inch round head with a total length of about 2 1/2 inches. These Snazaroo applicators are great for applying glitter. 1/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red disposable dual-tipped makeup applicators
1/2 inch round head, total length of 2 1/2 inches

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Disposable Large Foam Applicators (1/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Large Single Tipped Applicators are disposable foam face paint applicators. Each Snazaroo large foam applicator has 3/4 inch diameter foam head with a total overall length of 5 1/16 inches. These Snazaroo applicators work great for applying face glitter. 1/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red disposable large foam makeup applicators
3/4 diameter round head, total overall length of 5 1/16 inches

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Sponge-Tip Correctors
DescriptionData.Description: The Graftobian Sponge Tip Makeup Corrector is a handy tool for blending face paints or adding effects such as leopard dots. Graftobian Sponge-Tip Applicator has 1/3 inch round head and 7 inch long handle, making it ideal for detail work or touch ups. The Graftobian Sponge Tip Makeup Corrector is also great for applying glitter.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 13 inch round head and 7 inch handle
Great for blending, adding effects, and applying glitter

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red High Density Sponges (2/pk)
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo High Density Sponges are very durable and easy to clean. Each of these Snazaroo sponges measure about 2 inches in diameter and 1 inch thick. These Snazaroo High Density Sponge are recommended by Snazaroo for face painting. 10/pack

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Rainbow Cake Diamond Sponges (1/Pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Snazaroo Rainbow Cake Wedge Sponges are perfect for use with rainbow cakes or anytime you need to face paint straight sides. Snazaroo's wedge sponge is 3 inches long by 1 inch wide by 1 1/4 inches thick and can be reused hundreds of times. The unique rounded edges at the ends are perfect for the loading of rainbow cake face paint and painting the rainbow on the skin. The more you use it, the more the face paint is embedded into the rainbow sponge and the better the results on the skin. The Snazaroo Rainbow Cake Wedge Sponge is a great sponge for face painters doing one-stroke face painting. 1/pack
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ruby Red rainbow cake diamond sponges

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Stageline Brushes - 318 Flat
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Stageline Large Flat Face Painting Brush #318 is 5/16 in wide and works well for creating contours with even flat strokes. Mehron Stageline Brushes are made of Golden Nylon and are securely anchored into their handle to prevent shedding and disfiguration. Mehron Brushes provide excellent control and are very durable. These Mehron flat brushes are perfect for shadowing as well.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Stageline Brushes - Fan
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Stageline Fan Face Painting Brush #330 works well for removing extra powder from the face paint application. Mehron Stageline Brushes are made of Golden Nylon bristles and are securely anchored into their handle to prevent shedding and disfiguration. Mehron Brushes provide excellent control and are very durable. These Mehron fan brushes are great for creating butterfly wings.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Mark Reid Signature Brushes - Chisel
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Mark Reid Signature Brushes were created to the specifications of world famous face & body artist and instructor Mark Reid. The brush bristles are a beautiful two- tone nylon, incased in a sturdy brass ferrule which is coated black for an attractive appearance and function. The custom-shaped brush handles are made of wood coated with urethane for durability and designed for the professional face painter. An important feature of Mark Reid Signature buttons is the precisely angled end on each handle which is designed to help gently move any unwanted strands of hair, etc. without smudging the art work by touching the model with fingers.
The Mark Reid Chisel Brush is 1/2" wide.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Beautiful two- tone nylon, incased in a sturdy brass ferrule which is coated black
The custom-shaped brush handles are made of wood coated with urethane for durability and designed for the professional face painter
Precisely angled end on each handle which is designed to help gently move any unwanted strands of hair, etc without smudging the art work

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Paradise Brushes - 813 Fine Round
DescriptionData.Description: Paradise Makeup AQ Super Fine Point Face Painting Brush #813 is perfect for adding small details to your face painting designs. Designed by the world-famous face painter, Jinny, Paradise Makeup AQ brushes have luxurious nylon bristles, durable aluminum ferrules, and custom-length acrylic handles designed specifically for face painting. Paradise brushes are excellent professional-grade face and body paint brushes. These Paradise Super Fine Point brushes are perfect for making spider legs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Nylon bristles, aluminum ferrules, and acrylic handle

DescriptionData.Title: Nylon Brush Holder & Stand
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Nylon Brush Holder organizes your brushes and keeps them looking like new in this convenient holder. Mehron brush holder stands upright on your face painting table like an easel, and is made of nylon so it cleans easily. Brushes sold separately.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Paradise Brushes - 820 Foam Smoothie Blender
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's foam Smoothie Blender brush is the perfect applicator for pressed powders. This soft foam brush holds the powder well and distributes it evenly. Smoothie Blenders are also great for quickly applying base coats for water based face paints. The Smoothy Blender's rounded edges are good for detail work, while the flat sides cover quickly and efficiently.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Rounded edges are good for detail work.
Flat sides cover quickly and efficiently.
Great for quickly applying base coats for water based face paints.
Holds the powder well and distributes it evenly.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brush Sleeve
DescriptionData.Description: An outstanding brush holder created by International Makeup Artist Rebecca Rachael Holder keeps up to 13 brushes at the ready for quick access. Comfort fit to your arm, and easily cleaned and sanitized. Also has a convenient pocket for your business cards.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Handy brush holder fits on your arm
Created by International Makeup Artist Rebecca Rachael Holder
Has a convenient pocket for your business cards

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Brushes - #4 Round
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Round #4 Face Painting Brush #78058 is perfect for outlining faces and as a medium brush, the most often used brush in face painting. Graftobian's Ruby Master Painting Brush Series are made with Golden Taklon fiber, long known for its resilience, durability, and high quality. The number of the face painting brush follows this rule: the higher the number, the bigger or wider the face paint brush. Graftobian Round #4 Makeup Brush is an essential brush for face painting.
